titles.title: I Know That My Redeemer Liveth

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I know that my Redeemer liveth, And on the earth again shall stand; I know eternal life He giveth, That grace and pow'r are in His hand.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: I know, I know that Jesus liveth, And on the earth again shall stand. I know, I know that life He giveth, That grace and pow'r are in His hand.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I know his promise never faileth, The word He speaks, it cannot die; Tho' cruel death my flesh assaileth, Yet I shall see Him by and by.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I know my mansion He prepareth, That where He is there I may be; O wondrous tho't, for me He careth, And He at last will come for me.
